| HistoryText             = The Red Condors were an elite 6-man special forces team who hired themselves out to [[General Carranza (Earth-616)|General Carranza]]. When the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] arrived at [[Bosqueverde]] two months after the general escaped from an American jail and fled to Bosueverde, he started to kill the security around his luxurious "prison". The general hired the Red Condors for $3 million to kill the Punisher. The arrived by helicopter and began hunting him down. Nearly killing him, Punisher was temporarily made blind and deaf. Eventually, he turned the tables on them and killed them off one by one.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 91|92}}
